entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
